title: Taking backup from One DB present in RDS and migrate to other RDS Instance
content: Problem Statement: As part of DevSecOps team we take care of the AWS environment and make sure it is in compliance with the organizational policies. For this task we will writing a shell script which takes dump from one db (postgres) present inside RDS Instance to other RDS Instance. For example, a ShellScript is triggered when we want to take backup of particular DB Instance to other DB Instance. 1. Create a RDS Instance based on these configurations: 2. After DB is created in RDS note down the Endpoint for connecting to DB 3. Create a Shell Script which takes dump from a DB in RDS 1 and restores it in RDS 2. 3. After the script is written don't forget to save the script by pressing escape and Ctrl + S and changing the script's permission to chmod +x and executing it by ./script.sh 4. Shell Script is working successfully. 5. For Shell Script, you can refer the github repo in the references. Please do not forget to destroy the resources created. Thank you for reading my blog. References https://github.com/akhilsingh-git/Shell-Scripting-for-taking-backups
